weka.distributed.spark

Class KMeansClustererSparkJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.core.DistributedJob
      • weka.distributed.spark.SparkJob
        • weka.distributed.spark.KMeansClustererSparkJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, CommandlineRunnable, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler, ClustererProducer, TextProducer

    public class KMeansClustererSparkJob
extends SparkJob
implements CommandlineRunnable, TextProducer, ClustererProducer, OptionHandler
    Spark job for training a k-means clusterer with or without the k-means++ (kmeans||) initialization procedure
    Version:
    $Revision: 11611 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
